alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:08PM CST until January 09 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL CLARKE COUNTY... At 307 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barnett, or near Quitman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Quitman and De Soto around 320 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pachuta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
